mapper.select: select t.*, sd.name serviceDepartName, u.name umineName, ed.name equipDepartName, ty.value typeValue, f.name orgName from monitor_check t left join unit_service_depart sd on t.service_id = sd.id left join unit_umine u on t.umine_id = u.id left join unit_equip_depart ed on t.equip_depart_id = ed.id left join config_monitor_check_type ty on t.type_id = ty.id left join supervision_org f on t.org_id = f.id where t.id = #{id}
select t.id from monitor_check t where t.id = #{id} and not exists(select 1 from monitor_check_file a where a.monitor_check_id = t.id)
